user.description: Get your API key from the Eleven Labs website
user.title: Eleven Labs - Configuration

data.stability: Set the stability of the speech synthesis
data.similarity: Set the clarity/similarity boost of the speech synthesis
data.model: Change the model used for requests
data.optimize_streaming_latency: Reduce latency at the cost of quality
data.style: Style exaggeration, not supported in v1 models
data.use_speaker_boost: Speaker boost, not supported in v1 models
